sqlQuery.name: ById
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, ($$sequence_ids$$) ds WHERE lower(eas.source_id) = lower(ds.source_id) UNION SELECT seqref.aa_sequence_id FROM Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr, ($$sequence_ids$$) ds WHERE seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Seqs' AND lower(ref.primary_identifier) = lower(ds.source_id);
